headline: Nigeria Data Center Colocation Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025: Market to Grow at a CAGR of 48.37% to Reach $544 Million by 2030
summary: The Nigeria Data Center Colocation Market, valued at USD 51 million in 2024, is projected to reach USD 544 million by 2030, experiencing a robust CAGR of 48.37%. Positioned as one of Africa's rapidly expanding colocation markets, Nigeria benefits from strong connectivity, strategic location, and supportive government policies, addressing challenges like power and infrastructure. headline: Switzerland Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand Analysis Report 2025-2030 | Coverage of 75 Existing Facilities, 5 Upcoming Facilities, and 24 Cities
summary: The Switzerland Data Center Colocation Market, valued at USD 465 million in 2024, is forecast to reach USD 916 million by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 11.96%. headline: Ireland Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand Analysis 2025-2030 Featuring Key Players - Equinix, Keppel, BT, Digital Realty, K2 STRATEGIC, EdgeConneX, CyrusOne, Echelon, Pure Data Centres
summary: The Ireland Data Center Colocation Market, valued at USD 580 million in 2024, is projected to reach USD 1.86 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 21.45%. A key player in the FLAP-D market, Ireland's colocation ecosystem features 35 operational facilities. Dublin leads as the primary hub, while Cork, Galway, Wicklow, and Ennis see emerging growth.
